summary: This is an email from attorney Sigrid McCawley to Stan Pottinger and Paul Cassell, providing an update on deposition scheduling in a legal case involving Jeffrey Epstein. It mentions Epstein's scheduled deposition on October 12, 2018, in West Palm Beach, and that Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition is planned for October 30, 2018, in New York. The email also notes the hiring of an investigative firm to locate and serve other witnesses.

persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney sending an email update on deposition scheduling in a case involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. She mentions hiring an investigative firm to locate witnesses.

events.title: Letter motion submitted to court

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled to be deposed on October 12, 2018, in West Palm Beach by the legal team of Sigrid McCawley.
Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition was planned for October 30, 2018, in New York.
The legal team hired an investigative firm to help locate and serve other witnesses they believed would be helpful in the case.
A letter motion was submitted to the court on October 4, 2018, to resolve scheduling issues and lock in deposition dates.
The correspondence shows active legal proceedings and evidence gathering against Epstein and Maxwell in October 2018.
